lines: GUIDE ME, O THOU GREAT JEHOVAH!
1. Ndzi Letele Hosi Yesu, Endleleni Ya Wena,
Eku Tsaneni Ka Mina, Ndzi Kombela Matimba, Mukutsuri, Muhlayisi,
2. U Xihlovo Xa Vutomi, U Mati Ya Vutomi,
Langavi Leri Pfurhaka, Munyameni Wa Vusiku, Mukutsuri, Muhlayisi,
3. Ndzi Fikile Eyordan Susa Mapfalo Yanga,
Ndzi Perise U Ndzi Veka, Kanana Ro Saseka, Hoyohoyo, Yimbelela,
